DOC.brief_summary: This NICHD-funded RCT enroll 178 depress pregnant woman , randomly assign one 2 intervention condition : ( 1 ) gentle prenatal yoga program ( PYP ) , ( 2 ) series educational workshop focus perinatal health , Mom Baby Wellness Workshop ( MBWW ) , condition last 9 week . The investigator clinically monitor participant study safety clinical deterioration , measure variety symptom outcomes course intervention period pregnancy , well postpartum follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: Wellness 2 : Understanding How Foster Well Being Mom Her Baby
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize controlled trial , eligible woman randomly assign either 9-week Prenatal Yoga Program ( PYP ) vs. 9-week health education control group , Mother-Baby Wellness Workshop ( MBWW ) . Follow assessment take place multiple point study . The primary study outcome severity prenatal depression assess blind interviewer . The investigator examine relevant secondary outcome ( self-reported depression , anxiety , functioning , & pain ; pre-term birth ) potential mediator ( inflammation , mindfulness/non-judgment ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy singleton pregnancy , 1226 week gestation 2 . Medically cleared moderate exercise 3 . Depression symptom moderate range . Participants must Quick Inventory Depressive Symptoms ( IDS ; [ 119 ] ) score 820 4 . Englishspeaking 5 . Aged 18 old 1 . New unstable depression treatment 2 . Currently regular yoga practitioner 3 . Bipolar disorder , schizophrenia , psychotic depression , chronic psychosis 4 . Current hazardous drug alcohol use 5 . Acute suicidality
